name: Will the World Burn?
description:
A short and small game created for a game jam. HTML version seems to suffer from serious lags and some of the effects are not working, highly recommend to play on a downloaded version!

Known bugs:

  • HTML version is a bit laggy, not recommended if you can download the game instead
  • for a secret, when you use your item, don't press the button twice because it will cause problems (will be fixing it later after the game jam is closed)
  • Skill names are confusing and not consistent with the animation of the skills themselves
  • Linux and Mac OSX releases are untested due to running out of time and not having a Mac but included them in case some of you would like to give them a try
